content: This **lists [youth organisations](/wiki/Youth_organisation) in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore):** ## Community - NYAA Gold Award Holders' Alumni [*permanent dead link*] - nEbO - Junior Chamber of Singapore - [National Youth Council of Singapore](/wiki/National_Youth_Council_of_Singapore), The - *SCAPE Co. Ltd, - Tzu Chi Humanistic Youth Centre, - People's Association Youth Movement - People's Association T-Net Club, The - Generation ACTS Club, The - [Legion of Mary](/wiki/Legion_of_Mary), The - Metropolitan YMCA, ## Nature - Students Against Violation of the Earth (SAVE) - Youth Environmental Network ## Health and Wellness - Youth Advolution for Health (YAH) - SHY - Sexual Health and Wellness for Youths ## Outdoors - People's Association Adventure Pursuits - Raleigh Society - Singapore Adventurers' Club - [Singapore Youth Flying Club](/wiki/Singapore_Youth_Flying_Club) - Sunny Island Tree Climbers ## Uniformed groups - [National Cadet Corps](/wiki/National_Cadet_Corps_(Singapore)) - [National Civil Defence Cadet Corps](/wiki/National_Civil_Defence_Cadet_Corps) - [National Police Cadet Corps](/wiki/National_Police_Cadet_Corps) - [Red Cross Youth](/wiki/Red_Cross_Youth), [Singapore Red Cross](/wiki/Singapore_Red_Cross) Archived 9 January 2016 at the [Wayback Machine](/wiki/Wayback_Machine) - [Saint John Ambulance Brigade, Singapore](/wiki/Saint_John_Ambulance_Brigade,_Singapore) - [Girl Guides Singapore](/wiki/Girl_Guides_Singapore) - [The Boys' Brigade in Singapore](/wiki/The_Boys%27_Brigade_in_Singapore) - [Girls' Brigade Singapore](/wiki/Girls%27_Brigade_Singapore) - [The Singapore Scout Association](/wiki/The_Singapore_Scout_Association) ## Volunteer organisations - AIESEC Singapore Archived 8 March 2005 at the [Wayback Machine](/wiki/Wayback_Machine) - Heartware Network - SGRainbow - [Young Out Here](/wiki/Young_Out_Here) Archived 4 February 2016 at the [Wayback Machine](/wiki/Wayback_Machine) ## Musical Groups - [Singapore National Youth Orchestra](/wiki/Singapore_National_Youth_Orchestra) - Singapore Youth Wind Symphony - [Singapore Symphony Youth Choir](/wiki/Singapore_Symphony_Chorus) - [Singapore Symphony Children's Choir](/wiki/Singapore_Symphony_Chorus) - [List of social service agencies in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_social_service_agencies_in_Singapore) - [List of disability organisations in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_disability_organisations_in_Singapore) - MOE CCAB - Uniformed Group
title: List of youth organisations in Singapore
